name: Stickbound FREE!
description:
Play the most ADDICTIVE stick jumping game ever!

Stickbound offers an innovative stick jumping mechanic that's brand new on the iPhone/iPod Touch.

Touch the screen to extend your stick and propel yourself just like a pole vault. The longer you touch, the longer your stick will be.

The angle and placement of your stick determines the speed and trajectory of your jump, so act fast!

Check out the YouTube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E0QGU9E4Tko

-----------------------------
REVIEWS
-----------------------------

"It's clever and hasn't been done before, and provides a fun and compelling experience." - Touch Arcade

"If future support for Stickbound is even half as good as the seminal endless game Doodle Jump! then this addictive little title will become another perfect mainstay for any iPhone." - AppSpy

"If I had to describe it in three words, they would be: fun, addictive, and innovative." - AppModo

"5/5 Rating. Super fun to pick up and play" -Appsafari

"iPhone game of the week." - UWeekly.com

------------------
FEATURES
------------------

- Addicting and innovative gameplay!
- Gorgeous graphics.
- 2 Game Modes: Normal and Timed Modes.
- 5 extra unlockable characters.
- Fun ragdoll physics action.
- Catchy music and sound effects.
- Collect stars and earn extra lives.
- 2 cool Power-Ups: The Rocket and the Angel Wings.
- Global High Scores.
- OpenFeint integration - Leaderboards, Achievements and Forums.

Join us at Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gamenauts

Follow us at Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gamenauts
